segments.text: I see the boy balancing on that stool, and it looks like he’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, not even noticing the water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in drying that plate, she doesn’t see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the water is just spreading all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to tip over any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems so innocent, just waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s foot is already wet, but she doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get away with taking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, unlike the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe no one is reacting to any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR
